name: Oh Crab!
description:
Oh Crab! is a sitcom game that you shouldn't buy set on a beach about a fish whose house gets flooded and trampled.
The game is NOT a good game and we highly discourage anyone from getting it.

Features
- It is passive and you can't do much
- Walking
- Laughing
- Picking up seaweed
- Throwing bottle caps
- Crabs
- 5 minutes of playtime


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
